lead_paragraph: Dirk Nowitzki and Devean George each led crucial rallies with consecutive 3-pointers, helping the Dallas Mavericks overcome 45 points by Tracy McGrady in a 109-96 victory over the visiting Houston Rockets.
snippet: Dirk Nowitzki and Devean George each led crucial rallies with consecutive 3-pointers, helping the Dallas Mavericks overcome 45 points by Tracy McGrady in a 109-96 victory over the visiting Houston Rockets.
